name: Snake Dragging puzzle
author: Alucard648
info: Straight from Machinarium. Made on request by SkyFlare.
description: You have a maze containing different colored snakes made of combos. You can move the snakes in the maze by dragging their heads and tails (Ex1). Occupy all colored spots with same colored snakes to solve the puzzle.
setup: 1. Set up snake combos as shown in screenshot #1.2.Build the puzzle: use 1st combo and different CSets. Make sure that each snake part combo have no more than 2 adjacent combos of the same CSet.3. Triggers: Place combos with target Cset on  LAYER_SNAKEDRAG_TRIGGER layer. In the demo, it`s different colored rails on background. Flag those spaces with flag 66 on layer 0.4. Place invisible FFC with script and 1st combo from step 1 anywhere in the screen. No arguments needed.
